title: Riven and Ahri
body:
When will Riot stop listening to these "Riven/Ahri are my waifus" type of players and actually nerf these 2 obnoxious champions? 

Restore some balance to league of legends and nerf these 2, ULTRA HIGH mobility champions. Limit them at least somehow, currently they have no resources, no cooldowns and their kits provide too much, it's like something outta DOTA game. 

Inb4 "Ahri is an assasin she's supposed to be able to burst people!!!"

Lemme ask you : is assassin supposed to have Godly CC? How about her waveclear? And the utility she provides building Rilays? 

Please Riot, nerf these 2 champions ... They are true cancer of Solo Q, stop looking at competitive, pay attention to Solo Q as well.

replies.body:
Ahri is annoying, yes.

But Riven... She is abhorrently obnoxious.

I would rather drink plutonium over having to lane against a no-mana avalanche (Not just snowball) waiting to happen.

Ahri has high mana costs and has two skillshots. Godly cc? She has one cc ability that lasts for one second. You lose any credibility when you spout off garbage like that. Also, ahri has nerfs on pbe so you're behind the times even for a troll.
I hate Riven more than OP.  Upvoted.

Riven obnoxiousness? While yes she is not a champion you do not want to mess with in close combat, She is super easy to shut down with any sort of range. {{champion:126}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:133}} Each have the range and abilities to shut her down with little difficulty if played right.
I wouldn't say Ahri is hyper mobile, she has 3 dashes on her ult. Riven on the other hand.
